title: TinyClaw â€” AI Tool Review
description: TinyClaw is an independent open-source AI agent inspired by OpenClaw, offering a clean minimal autonomous assistant for developers. TinyClaw is an independent AI agent project inspired by OpenClaw's philosophy of local, autonomous AI assistance. It provides a clean, minimal implementation as a starting point for developers building custom OpenClaw-style agents. Highlights: Clean minimal codebase. Good for customization. Open-source. Independent of OpenClaw security concerns.
